author: Paul Reynolds
title: Gardaí to set up checkpoints to curb Easter travel
description: Gardaí have been given new powers to restrict people's movements and gatherings for the next four days under emergency health legislation brought in last month.
content:
Gardaí have been given new powers to restrict people's movements and gatherings for the next four days under emergency health legislation brought in last month.
The Minister for Health signed the regulations last night enabling gardaí to enforce the new law,… [+3050 chars]
